raw_body: Passed away Peacefully. Beloved husband of Rita, loving father of Maxwell and Marguerite, grandfather of Melinda and Nadine, father-in-law of Nigel Coqqins, son of the late Mr. and Ms. Hugh Keegel. Remains will lie at A.F. Raymond’s Funeral Parlour, Borella on Friday 17th May 2024 from 9.00 a.m. Funeral Service at 4.00 p.m. followed by burial at Kanatte, Borella (Roman Catholic Section)
